name: Raging Ball (itch)
description:
In Raging Ball (the title is a parody of Raging Bull starring Robert De Niro lol), you play as a very angry, well, ball. Rid of the agility and speed of usual platformer characters, you have to take it slow, every time you face an enemy, it is a duel, timing and patience is key, button mashing will only get you killed. 

Only playable with a controller.
